name: qBitControl
description: qBitControl is a tool to control qBittorrent remotely.

apps.name: qBitControl
apps.subtitle: Remote client for qBittorrent.
apps.localizedDescription: qBitControl is the definitive remote client for managing your qBittorrent downloads on iOS devices. With qBitControl, you can effortlessly add torrents, browse files, monitor your download progress, and manage your torrents, all while enjoying real-time statistics and a native iOS user interface.

versions.localizedDescription:
New:
• Add Search Functionality to RSS Tab

Improvements:
• Improve Charts in Stats Tab

Fixes:
• Fix Translation Related Bugs
• Update Translation
• Add a Missing Uncategorized Option in Category Selection View

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Michael•128/qBitControl/compare/1.3.2...1.3.3

New:
• Added New Category & Tag Selection System
• Added RSS Feed & Folder Renaming & Deleting
• Updated Translations

Improvements:
• Enhance Tips when Adding Server (by: @MrNocole in https://github.com/Michael•128/qBitControl/pull/62)
• Improve Naming to Match qBitttorrent

Fixes:
•  Fixed Pause Option for qBittorrent 5.0.X in 'Torrent Add Sheet'


Full Changelog: https://github.com/Michael•128/qBitControl/compare/1.3.1...1.3.2

New:
• Added RSS Support
• Added 'Add Tracker' Option
• Added Option to Download First & Last Pieces First
• Added Force Start Option
• Added 'Help with Translation' Button in About Section
• Added Chinese Simplified Localization (by @peaynan)


Improvements:
• Rearranged Torrent Details & Added ETA
• Updated Localizations

Fixes:
• Fixed Compatibility with qBittorrent 5.0.0 API

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Michael•128/qBitControl/compare/1.2.2...1.3.1

New:
• Added Server Editing

Fixed:
• Disabled Category Path Auto•Fill if Automatic Torrent Management is Enabled
• Fixed Compatibility for Older qBittorrent Clients

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Michael•128/qBitControl/compare/1.2.1...1.2.2

New:
• Improved 'Stats' View
• Added 'About' Section

Fixed:
• Torrent availability is now displayed correctly
• Fixed password encoding


Full Changelog: https://github.com/Michael•128/qBitControl/compare/1.2...1.2.1

New:
• Added Torrent Priority Management 
• Added Sequential Download Option
• Added MacCatalyst support (by: @vit9696)
• Added Polish & Japanese Localizations
• Allowed HTTP connections over the internet

Fixed:
• Fixed incorrect ratio bug on stats page
• Refactored a lot of code
• Fix category save path not updating (by: @narenh)

New Contributors
Thank you @vit9696 and @narenh for contributing to the repository. Your efforts are greatly appreciated!
• @vit9696 made their first contribution in https://github.com/Michael•128/qBitControl/pull/11
• @narenh made their first contribution in https://github.com/Michael•128/qBitControl/pull/15

Full Changelog: https://github.com/Michael•128/qBitControl/compare/1.1...1.2
